dojo.name: The Cathedral
dojo.description: Training in the arts of planning, documentation, and coordination.
dojo.entry_ritual: Before you lay a single stone, you must see the cathedral complete in your mind.

skills.name: The First Scroll
skills.training: Practice: Document an existing system so someone new could understand it.
skills.mastery_check: Can others understand your docs without asking questions?

skills.name: The Interview
skills.training: Practice: Turn a vague request into specific, actionable requirements.

skills.name: The Charter
skills.training: Practice: Write a spec, have someone implement it, measure gap.
skills.mastery_check: Do your specs reduce implementation ambiguity?

skills.name: The Blueprint
skills.training: Practice: Diagram a complex system using appropriate notation.
skills.mastery_check: Can you explain a system in one diagram?

skills.name: The Chronicle
skills.training: Practice: Write ADRs for past architectural decisions.
skills.mastery_check: Could future devs understand why you chose X over Y?

skills.name: Campaign Planning
skills.description: Break large initiatives into manageable phases
skills.training: Practice: Plan a 3-month project with milestones and dependencies.
skills.mastery_check: Can you see the path from here to shipped?

skills.name: The Council
skills.training: Practice: Get engineering, design, and product to agree on scope.

skills.name: Scout's Report
skills.description: Identify and mitigate project risks early
skills.training: Practice: Enumerate risks for a project and propose mitigations.
skills.mastery_check: Do you find risks before they find you?

skills.name: The Cathedral Vision
skills.description: Design systems that scale and evolve
skills.training: Practice: Design a system to handle 100x current load.
skills.mastery_check: Can you see years ahead in system evolution?

skills.name: The Proclamation
skills.training: Practice: Write a technical strategy doc that aligns multiple teams.
skills.mastery_check: Do your documents drive organizational change?

training_quests.name: The Founding Document
training_quests.objective: Create a spec that could be handed to a developer

training_quests.name: The Grand Design
training_quests.objective: Create a system diagram that communicates architecture clearly

quick_load: Load paladin dojo. What documents do I need to write? What decisions need recording? Show me the planning skill tree.
